lemming.character

Class CharacterDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • lemming.data.GenericDao<Character>
      • lemming.character.CharacterDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICharacterDao, IDao<Character>

    public class CharacterDao
extends GenericDao<Character>
implements ICharacterDao
    Represents a Data Access Object providing data operations for special characters.
